class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/WaypointGroup
class.description: A panel allowing to group various points of interest into a waypoint group

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/AddPoi
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new point of interest.

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/AddPod
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new point of direction.

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/AddZoi
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new zone of interest.
